titles.title: Interagency Council on Homelessness Reauthorization Act of 2005
A bill to amend the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to reauthorize the Interagency Council on Homelessness.
Interagency Council on Homelessness Reauthorization Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Interagency Council on Homelessness Reauthorization Act of 2005 - Amends the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to extend statutory authority and authorization of appropriations for the United States Interagency Council on Homelessness.
